FullTitle: Amedei Presents The Cuisine of Chef Yves Schmid with the wines of Marchesi dè Frescobaldi
ShortTitle: Amedei Presents The Cuisine of Chef Yves Schmid with the wines of Marchesi dè Frescobaldi
FullDescription: Date : 28 May 2015, Thursday Time : 7pm Price : $102.40++ (U.P.S$128.00++) Venue : Senso Ristorante & Bar, 21 Club Street, Singapore 069410 Dress Code : Smart Casual  Delight your senses in a unique dining experience at Senso Ristorante & Bar, Indulge in a divine 5-course menu specially curated by Executive Chef Yves Schmid, each course gracefully presents the marriage of savoury and chocolate from Amedei. Look forward to a myriad of eclectic dishes exquisitely paired with the wines of Marchesi dè Frescobaldi.
